com.jefflunt.pedestrians
Class Pedestrian.ObstacleSensor

java.lang.Object
  com.jefflunt.pedestrians.Pedestrian.ObstacleSensor
Enclosing class:
Pedestrian
private class Pedestrian.ObstacleSensor
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a simple obstacle sensor, used to tell the Pedestrian when an obstacle is encountered.

          The Pedestrian associated with this ObstacleSensor.

Constructor Detail

Pedestrian.ObstacleSensor

public Pedestrian.ObstacleSensor(Pedestrian ped,
                                 float relativeX,
                                 float relativeY,
                                 float turnRate,
                                 float speedMultiplier)
Builds a new obstacle sensor.

Parameters:
ped - the Pedestrian who owns this sensor.
relativeX - the x-coordinate of the position relative to the Pedestrian's center point and direction of travel
relativeY - the y-coordinate of the position relative to the Pedestrian's center point, and direction of travel
turnRate - the rate at which the Pedestrian should turn when this sensor indicates an obstacle
speedMultiplier - the speed multiplier applied to the Pedestrian's speed, when this sensor indicates an obstacle
Method Detail

relativeTileIsBlocked

public boolean relativeTileIsBlocked(com.jefflunt.pedestrians.pathfinding.PedestrianTileBasedMap tileMap)
Gets whether or not the PedestrianTileBasedMap tile is blocked, or open.

Parameters:
tileMap - the PedestrianTileBasedMap to use
Returns:
true, if the corresponding tile is blocked, false if it is open.

relativePointSensesPedestrian

public boolean relativePointSensesPedestrian(com.jefflunt.pedestrians.pathfinding.PedestrianTileBasedMap tileMap)
Gets whether or not this sensor senses a Pedestrian.

Parameters:
tileMap - the PedestrianTileBasedMap to use, to get the TileState, and the resulting list of Pedestrians in that tile
Returns:
true if a Pedestrian is detected, false otherwise.
